sys_remote_update_set.description:
NOTE: This update set is to only be committed to a ServiceNow Instance that has already committed the Update Set (VictorOps Integration) which was created in 2015.
This update set will remove/deactivate the Application/Framework of the initial VictorOps Integration. This action should be performed before downloading the new VictorOps application from the ServiceNow Store.
sys_remote_update_set.name: Deprecate Initial VictorOps Integration

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_e50c6bae0f37f1009b4586bce1050e0f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_victorops_commands</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_victorops_commands">u_entity_idSTARTSWITHVO_INC^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_entity_id" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="STARTSWITH" or="false" value="VO_INC"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>VictorOps Ack-Back</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[
function onAfter(current, previous) {
	// ackBack(command row, ack state, resolve state, task table)
	(new VictorOpsHelper()).ackBack(current, 2, 3, 'u_victorops_incidents');
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-05-06 18:51:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e50c6bae0f37f1009b4586bce1050e0f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>VictorOps Ack-Back</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e50c6bae0f37f1009b4586bce1050e0f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jcote</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-12 22:38:55</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e50c6bae0f37f1009b4586bce1050e0f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_victorops_commands</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>VictorOps Ack-Back ServiceNow Incident</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
	// ackBack(command row, ack state, resolve state, task table)
	(new VictorOpsHelper()).ackBack(current, 2, 6, 'incident');
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-05-12 20:31:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>48bc3e640f4006002cf786bce1050e28</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>VictorOps Ack-Back ServiceNow Incident</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_48bc3e640f4006002cf786bce1050e28</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jcote</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-12 22:38:55</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=48bc3e640f4006002cf786bce1050e28"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>global.VictorOpsHelper</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>*** DEPRECATED ***

The below library was utilized in the initial ServiceNow VictorOps Integration, which was released and supported by VictorOps. This integration has been upgraded and can be downloaded from the ServiceNow App Store. 

Main library for the VictorOps application.</description><name>VictorOpsHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var VictorOpsHelper = Class.create();

VictorOpsHelper.prototype = {
	initialize: function(openStates, ackStates, criticalPriorities, warningPriorities) {
		this.logSource = 'VictorOps';
		this.verbosity = gs.getProperty('victorops.verbosity', '3');
		this.apiKey    = gs.getProperty("victorops.apiKey");
		this.orgSlug   = gs.getProperty("victorops.orgSlug");
		this.alertURL  = 'https://alert.victorops.com/integrations/generic/20131114/alert';
		this.cmdPollURL = 'https://alert.victorops.com/monitorCmds?monitorName=&monitorType=30';
		this.openStates = openStates;
		this.ackStates = ackStates;
		this.warningPriorities = warningPriorities;
		this.criticalPriorities = criticalPriorities;
	},
	
	log: function(msg, level) {
		if(!level)
			level=3;
		if(level <= this.verbosity)
			gs.log(msg, this.logSource);
	},
	
	getElement: function(current, name) {
		return current[name].toString();
	},
	
	getJournal: function(j) {
		return(j.getJournalEntry(-1).split("\n\n"));
	},
	
	latestEntry: function(j) {
		var entries = this.getJournal(j);
		for (var i=0; i<entries.length; i++) {
			var e = entries[i].trim();
			if (e.length > 0)
				return e;
		}
		return '';
	},
	
	addJournal: function(jsonData, journal, prefix) {
		var entries = this.getJournal(journal);
		for (var i=0; i<entries.length; i++) {
			if (entries[i].trim().length > 0)
				jsonData["sn." + prefix + "." + i] = entries[i];
		}
	},
	
	toAlert: function(current, messageType) {
		var jsonData = {
			"monitoring_tool": "ServiceNow",
			"message_type": messageType,
			"entity_id": this.getElement(current, "number"),
			"state_message": this.getElement(current, "short_description"),
			"entity_display_name": "ServiceNow - " + this.getElement(current, "number"),
	                "sys_id":this.getElement(current, "sys_id"),
			"ack_msg": this.latestEntry(current.work_notes)
		};
		var fields = current.getFields();
		for (var i = 0; i < fields.size(); i++) {
			var field = fields.get(i);
			if (field.hasValue()) {
				jsonData["sn."+field.getName()] = field.toString();
			}
		}
		this.addJournal(jsonData, current.work_notes, 'work_notes');
		this.addJournal(jsonData, current.comments, 'comments');
		return JSON.stringify(jsonData);
	},
	
	contains: function(arr, thing) {
		var s = parseInt(thing.toString());
		return (new ArrayUtil()).contains(arr, s);
	},
	
	isOpen: function(state) {
		return (this.contains(this.openStates, state));
	},
	
	isAcked: function(state) {
		return (this.contains(this.ackStates,state));
	},
	
	isCritical: function(priority) {
		return (this.contains(this.criticalPriorities, priority));
	},
	
	isWarning: function(priority) {
		return (this.contains(this.warningPriorities, priority));
	},
	
	calcType: function(state, priority) {
		this.log("Warn: " + this.isWarning(priority) + "  Critical: " + this.isCritical(priority) + "  Open: " + this.isOpen(state) + "  Acked: " + this.isAcked(state), 3);
		
		if (this.isOpen(state)) {
			if (this.isCritical(priority)) {
				messageType = "CRITICAL";
			} else if (this.isWarning(priority)) {
				messageType = "WARNING";
			} else {
				messageType = "INFO";
			}
		} else if (this.isAcked(state)) {
			messageType = "ACKNOWLEDGEMENT";
		} else {
			messageType = "RECOVERY";
		}
		return messageType;
	},
	
	groupJoin: function(group, keyTable, joinTable) {
		var rec = new GlideRecord(keyTable);
		rec.addJoinQuery(joinTable).addCondition('u_group', group);
		rec.query();
		if (rec.next())
			return rec;
		return undefined;
	},

	lookUpRouting: function(current) {
		var group = current.assignment_group;
		this.log("Look up routing for " + group, 3);
		var rec = this.groupJoin(group, 'u_victorops_routing_keys', 'u_victorops_group_routing');
		if (rec) {
			this.log(group + " routes to " + rec.u_routing_key, 2);
			return rec.u_routing_key.toString();
		}
		return undefined;
	},
	
	lookUpAPIKey: function(current) {
		var group = current.assignment_group;
		this.log("Look up API key for " + group, 3);
		var rec = this.groupJoin(group, 'u_victorops_api_keys', 'u_victorops_group_keys');
		if (rec) {
			this.log(group + " uses api key " + rec.u_api_key, 2);
			return rec.u_api_key.toString();
		}
		return undefined;
	},
	
	buildURL: function(apiKey, routingKey) {
		var k = this.apiKey;
		if (apiKey)
			k = apiKey;
		var u = this.alertURL + "/" + k;
		if (routingKey)
			u = u + "/" + routingKey;
		return u;
	},
	
	notify: function(current,  messageType) {
		try {
			if ( !messageType )
				messageType = this.calcType(current.state, current.priority);
			
			var url = this.buildURL(this.lookUpAPIKey(current), this.lookUpRouting(current));
			
			this.log("Notifying for " + current.number + ": " + url, 2);
			this.log(this.toAlert(current), 3);
			var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('VictorOps alert endpoint', 'post');
			r.setStringParameter('alertURL', url);
			r.setRequestBody(this.toAlert(current, messageType));
			
			this.log("Sending alert to " + this.alertURL, 3);
			var response = r.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
			this.log(current.number + " notification response code: " + httpStatus, 1);
		}
		catch(e) {
			this.log(current.number + " error notifying: " + e, 1);
		}
	},
	
	ackBack: function(current, ackState, recoveryState, table) {
		try {
			var entity_id = current.u_entity_id;
			var alert_type = current.u_alert_type;
			var note = current.u_author + ': ' + current.u_message;
			
			var newState = ackState;
			if (alert_type == "RECOVERY")
				newState = recoveryState;
			
			this.log('Executing VictorOps ack-back: ' + entity_id + ': ' + alert_type, 1);
			
			var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
			gr.addQuery('number', entity_id);
			gr.query();
			while (gr.next()) {
				this.log('Updating incident state ' + gr.number + ' to ' + newState, 3);
				gr.state = newState;
				gr.work_notes = gr.work_notes + note + '\n\n';
				gr.update();
			}
		} catch (ex) {
			this.log('Failed ack-back: ' + ex, 1);
		}
	},
	
	pollForCommands: function(org, key) {
		try {
			if (!org)
				org = this.orgSlug;
			if (!key)
				key = this.apiKey;
			var url = this.cmdPollURL + '&orgSlug='+org+'&orgKey='+key;
			
			this.log('Polling for commands at ' + url, 3);
			
			var httpclient = Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient;
			var client     = new httpclient.HttpClient();
			var get        = new httpclient.methods.GetMethod(url);
			var status     = client.executeMethod(get);
			if (status != 200) {
				throw 'Error status from server: ' + status;
			}
			var resp = get.getResponseBodyAsString();
			var cmds = (new JSONParser()).parse(resp);
			this.log('Command poll result: ' + resp, 3);
			this.log('Got ' + (cmds.length-1) + ' commands from VictorOps', 3);
			for (var i=0; i<cmds.length; i++) {
				c = cmds[i];
				if (c.entity_id) {
					this.log('Got command for ' + c.entity_id + ': ' + c.alert_type, 2);
					var gr = new GlideRecord('u_victorops_commands');
					gr.initialize();
					gr.u_entity_id     = c.entity_id;
					gr.u_alert_type    = c.alert_type;
					gr.u_author        = c.ack_author;
					gr.u_message       = c.ack_msg;
					gr.insert();
				}
			}
		} catch (ex) {
			this.log('Error polling for acks/resolves: ' + ex, 1);
		}
	},
	
	type: 'VictorOps'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-05-06 18:16:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>c374e76e0f37f1009b4586bce1050ee7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>VictorOpsHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c374e76e0f37f1009b4586bce1050ee7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jcote</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-12 22:40:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_victorops_commands</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>VictorOps Ack-Back ServiceNow Problem</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
	// ackBack(command row, ack state, resolve state, task table)
	(new VictorOpsHelper()).ackBack(current, 2, 4, 'problem');
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-05-12 20:33:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3f2dfe640f4006002cf786bce1050e62</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>VictorOps Ack-Back ServiceNow Problem</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3f2dfe640f4006002cf786bce1050e62</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jcote</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-12 22:38:52</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3f2dfe640f4006002cf786bce1050e62"/></record_update>
